text: Stukely-Sud is a village of 950 people, part of the Memphrémagog Regional County Municipality in the Estrie region of Quebec, Canada. ==Demographics== ===Population=== Population trend:Statistics Canada: 1996, 2001, 2006, 2011 census {| class="wikitable" |- ! Census ! Population ! Change (%) |- | 2011 | 999 | 6.2% |- | 2006 | 941 | 2.5% |- | 2001 | 965 | 9.5% |- | 1996 | 882 | 17.0% |- | 1991 | 754 | N/A |} ===Language=== Mother tongue (2011) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Language ! Population ! Pct (%) |- | French only | 830 | 83.4% |- | English only | 140 | 14.1% |- | Both English and French | 10 | 1.0% |- | Non-official languages | 15 | 1.5% |} == See also == * List of village municipalities in Quebec ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Quebec Category:Incorporated places in Estrie
title: Stukely-Sud, Quebec
